title: Lunar Revel Sets [PRICE BUG]
body:
The Year of the Goat Set appears to be charging you for the champions regardless of whether or not you own them.

EDIT - This appears to be the case with multiple bundles. Anyone wondering if you will be charged the FULL RP amount stated in the store (e.g. 6000RP when you should be charged 3000), you will be overcharged for now - I'm sure Riot is already on it.

replies.body: Yeah the prices are bugged at the moment.. I'm trying to get the mega bundle and its trying to charge me the full 12,325 for 1 champion and 4 skins
I lied about the ward skin and summoner icon. It's just the champions by the looks.
